about_the_game:
In Project Chernaya you are trapped in a labyrinthine bunker where the walls are filled with a malevolent force. As you navigate the dark hallways, you'll discover messages containing the secrets of the nuclear armor deep within the facility. But be careful, every step you take and the deeper you go, the more you will realize that you are not alone...

Key Features:

  • Puzzle Mechanics: Engage your mind with puzzles that blend seamlessly into the terrifying atmosphere. Use your wits to unlock secrets and advance through chilling levels.

  • Immersive Horror Experience: Encounter a relentless monster that will seek your death at all costs. Will you hide, run, or confront your fears?

  • Rich Lore & Easter Eggs: Discover hidden lore files scattered throughout the game, providing insights into the chilling backstory. Keep an eye out for clever Easter eggs that reward exploration and curiosity [in-game achievements].

  • Atmospheric Environments: Explore a claustrophobic place with rooms full of disturbing details that immerse you in a world of terror.

  • Dynamic Gameplay: Experience a combination of stealth and action as you navigate tension-filled environments. Your approach can lead you to the exit but also to death.

                                                                                                                                                        

Included Content:

With your purchase of Project Chernaya, you will receive:

  • The complete game featuring all puzzles and chilling encounters

  • Access to future updates, including new puzzles and lore expansions

name: Project Chernaya

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 - 10100F
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 - 11700F
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce RTX 3060 / AMD Radeon 5600XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: Project Chernaya is a FPS Puzzle Based game combined with horror on a post sovietic theme. Be careful, every step you take and the deeper you go, the more you will realize that you are not alone...
